page.title: 10INTERVIEW WITH WILSONS (1)
page.content: {Mr and Mrs Wilson}have lived in Sabden all their lives which is{76}years.Yet they have not lived in the same house. The streets they have lived on are { {Watt St.}and{Pendle St.West. During the war they had to black out the windows and have black curtains.In the houses all they had for light was one single lamp bulb hanging from the roof.At night a warden would come round to make sure everything was blacked out.The reason for this being is that if any planes went by,they would see the lights and probaly bomb them. {Mr and Mrs Wilson }both had work.Mr wilson was a cook for the army and Mrs wilson worked in a mill.People were never bored because everyone was very friendly and when they were working everyone sang along. {By JULIA PRENDERGAST/CATHERINE SMITH
